TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseChannelObjectWithProperties extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Provides a base implementation of a channel object that exposes a dictionary interface to its properties.

remarks.format:
## Remarks BaseChannelObjectWithProperties is the base class for <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelSinkWithProperties>.
<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelSinkWithProperties> can be used as the base classes for channels and channel sinks that provide named properties.
BaseChannelObjectWithProperties handles the complex task of asking a channel object for its properties.
This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level. A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission. For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
## Examples [!code-cpp[CommonTransportKeys#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.runtime.remotin_31_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[CommonTransportKeys#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.runtime.remotin_31_1.cs)] [!code-vb[CommonTransportKeys#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.runtime.remotin_31_1.vb)]

Docs.permission: For operating with infrastructure code. Demand value: ; Permission value:

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Add(object key, object value) cil managed

Docs.param: The key that is associated with the object in the `value` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method must not be implemented because it does not apply to the way <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> is being used in this case, and because <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties.IsFixedSize%2A> returns `true`.

Docs.summary: Gets the number of properties associated with the channel object.
Docs.value: The number of properties associated with the channel object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator> that enumerates over all the properties associated with the channel object.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator> that enumerates over all the properties associated with the channel object.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the number of properties that can be entered into the channel object is fixed.
Docs.value: if the number of properties that can be entered into the channel object is fixed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The current implementation of IsFixedSize always returns `true`.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection of properties in the channel object is read-only.
Docs.value: if the collection of properties in the channel object is read-only; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The current implementation of IsReadOnly always returns `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the dictionary of channel object properties is synchronized.
Docs.value: if the dictionary of channel object properties is synchronized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The current implementation of IsSynchronized always returns `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual object this[object key] { get; set; }

Docs.param: The key of the property to get or set.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the property that is associated with the specified key.
Docs.value: The property that is associated with the specified key.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of keys that the channel object properties are associated with.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of keys that the channel object properties are associated with.

Docs.summary: Gets a <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the channel properties associated with the channel object.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the channel properties associated with the channel object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Channels properties are used to configure the channel at run time.

Docs.exception: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
